column5: A while back gamma had a free ice line giveaway...  i got my free 50yd spool and tried spooling it, knot kept breaking and i was unable to spool it...  i emailed Gamma, and today i recieved a replacement 110yd spool  and a Gamma Hat...  Hats off to them for great customer service...
Good to see good service recognized!
always to see some good service when we hear about so much bad service
i use gamma line for couple years now, no problems but i might call them now so i can get a new hat!! bahahah
